The International School of Moscow Part of The British Schools Group
Dear Parents,
We have only two weeks to go until the break. There are lots of opportunities to join us in school during that time with the highlights listed below:
School Productions:
Tuesday 10th December 9:15 am Year 3
Wednesday 11th December 9:30 am Year 6
Wednesday 11th December 6:00 pm Year 3
Thursday 12th December 6:00 pm Year 6
Sporting Events:
MISAS U16 Basketball Tournament: Friday 6th and Saturday 7th December
Wednesday 11th December Year One Splash Day
Thursday 12th December Year Two and Three Splash Day
Secondary School Parent Teacher Consultations (Y7-11):
Tuesday 10th 4 - 6pm
Wednesday 11th 4 - 6pm
Christmas Carol Concert:
Wednesday 18th December Year 1 to Year 4 - 6 - 7:00 PM
Year 5 to Year 11 - 7:15 - 8:15 PM
ICT Information session
On Tuesday 17th December we will be holding an information session for all parents of students in the Secondary School about the ways in which new technologies are used to support learning at ISM.
Come along to find out about:
How students and teachers can use mobile devices to support and enhance learning; Our ambitious plans for the use of new technologies in the future; Student Digital Leaders; How to best support your child to manage their digital lives safely.
There will also be an opportunity for parents to engage in an open Question and Answer session with Chris Mayoh, ICT Development Coordinator, to discuss the content of the session. Refreshments will be served from 8.30am and the session will begin promptly at 9.00am. We hope to see you there for this important session. Spring Term Invoices Spring term invoices are due on December 15th, we very much appreciate the timely payments. Safety at pick-up time Our security team has asked me to remind all parents, drivers and nannies to ensure that all students on Lower Campus are supervised and dropped off at the gate in the morning. It is NOT safe to allow children to walk from the car to the gate independently at this age. Thank you for your support on this crucial health and safety issue. Seminar Cancelled Please note that tomorrow’s seminar - Life for the Spouse abroad – has been cancelled. We will try and reschedule next term. Have a wonderful wintry weekend. Paul Seedhouse
Headteacher
The International School of Moscow
